summary: Adds Tsun\'s armor and boots as new wearable, craftable, and upgradable items.
descriptionHtml:
Made by request I got via PM. Adds Tsun\'s armor and boots as craftable, upgrade
able, wearable items.

The recipes are in the Steel section of the forge but dont require any special
perks or quest requirements. Has the same stats as the unequipable Tsun items.

Weight and value is based off of Scaled armor because the armor ratings closely
matched the npcs items.
author: Aridale Noblebrook Belmont
